response.overview: In 2023, the 100th anniversary of the birth of the outstanding Soviet singer Mikhail Pavlovich Ryba. In the 50s and 60s of the XX century in the USSR, his voice boomed in films, from radios and from the stage. The life and work of Mikhail Ryba is a snapshot of the key events of the 20th century. The singer with a unique, inimitable voice has always been at the forefront of current events. His voice resonated in the soul of a child and an adult, a sophisticated listener and a simple worker. It was the Voice of a generation, the Voice of an era.
response.title: The Voice of Eternity Has a Name
